features: Fashionable Accessory: Carry your phone hassle-free with our crossbody chain; You can use the phone strap to complete any outfit and keep your hands free while enjoying the outdoors, on vacations, shopping, at concerts, or any event where you can’t compromise on your look with a bag

Premium Materials: This crossbody chain is beautifully made with high-quality materials and features a durable metallic in-case anchor; This aesthetic phone strap can be easily attached or detached, making it convenient for on-the-go use

Compatible with all Phone Cases: The universal phone lanyard seamlessly attaches to all phones & phone cases including iPhone 15, 14, 13, 12, 11 Series, Samsung Galaxy S24, S23, S22, S21 series, and Google Pixel 8, 7, and 6 Series; It gives your phone a subtle, trendy pop and does not block any ports or buttons

Easy Installation: Styling with this fashionable cell phone lanyard crossbody is a breeze. Just select your phone case, slide our attachment piece through it, place your phone inside, and secure the crossbody chain clasps; You'll be ready to go in no time!
Package Contents: 1 Unit of Case-Mate Crossbody Phone Chain - Gold (Package does not include phone case, sold separately); 1 Year Warranty
body.description: Save yourself the strain of constantly searching for your phone and keep it by your side with this Phone Crossbody Lanyard. The universal phone strap is a great accessory to complete any fashionable outfit, especially at events, festivals, parties, concerts, vacations, shopping, or anywhere you want to keep your hands free.Case-Mate Phone Chain Strap Features:Hands-Free ConvenienceCompatible with Both Apple and Android Phones & Phone CasesEasy ApplicationLightweightDetachable StrapsVersatile Usage1-Year WarrantyWho are we: We at Case-Mate ensure to provide stylish yet thoughtful phone cases and mobile accessories to our shoppers. All of our designs are not only built to look good but also to protect your phone. Whether it comes with military-grade shock-absorbing layers or provides 12 feet of drop protection, our products are built to withstand drops from varying heights.We have a variety of case designs for the newest flagship smartphones such as iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15, Samsung S24 series, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well with my phone
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, and the quality is excellent. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this phone lanyard!
reviews.reviewText: I love this phone lanyard! Not only was it a great price, but it is also great quality and very easy to use.Most importantly, it was super cute! I would definitely purchase again. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute phone chain!
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite phone chain. It is an eyecatcher. The chain is very cute. Seems very sturdy. The hardware is nice and of good quality so far. This is my new favorite phone case thingy.LOL❤️ I’ll take a pic when I can. Sorry about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty and very comfortable around my neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never Misplace your phone again.
reviews.reviewText: I love my phone chains. They come in very handy when I have so many things to carry. I can just slip this around my neck or you can wear it crossbody. Either way, they are perfect. It also looks very nice. Not cheap and low in quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars craftsmanship nice but heavy
reviews.reviewText: I loved the way it looked and the craftsmanship was great but the weight was extremely heavy. when you add the phone it was very awkward to use and dug in my neck when wearing it crossbody. so I returned it sadly. wish they would come out with a lighter one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it a lot :)
reviews.reviewText: I like the stripe. It turned out to be longer than I expected, but it seems to be durable. I have a screen protector on my phone, so I don't mind the weight of the metallic chain on the stripe..It is still difficult to determine the durability of the plastic component that fits under the cover case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Conveniently holds phone for easy access.
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of the chain - it's classy looking. So functional too especially when I'm managing events and need to take a quick photo of something or someone without having to fumble to unzip a purse.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this crossbody lanyard for my phone.
reviews.reviewText: If you keep leaving your cell phone lying all over the house and never have it when people text or phone, this is what you need. I love that it's a crossbody so that when you attach the phone, it's not too heavy around your neck. Been using for a few days now and I always have my phone when I people call or text. My family were getting frustrated with me because they would call and I wouldn't have my phone on me. LOL... if you have the same issue, you'll love this as much as I do.
